titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: [Loose sheet, seeming to refer to the contents of particular pages in the journal]

body.hi: 144. Bp. Lightfoot on the Quicunque vult: in Convocation July 31 1879

p.hi: ? [sic] Bryce on my E.R. article on the C. of E.
138. Gow's talk on the effect of the War
110. My letter to Gee about the Deanery of York
98. Bp. Hall's opinion of Russian Christians
96. Chancellor Wortledge approves my view of the proper uses of capitular revenues
